text: Steven is an outstanding stylist! I had tried many salons for hair rebonding, but none worked out. Then a friend recommended this place, and after trying it, my hair is in fantastic condition. Not only is his rebonding great, but his haircutting skills are also amazing. Iâ€™ve been coming here for around 7-8 years, and now my daughter comes here too for her haircuts. Totally worth the money!

Nicely renovated salon with friendly staff. Staff are all very patient and do not rush through haircuts. Nice ambience with comfortable seats. They even have a hot towel to pat down your neck after they rinse your hair. Great service, highly recommend and will definitely be my go to for hair cuts.

Steven, the salon's manager was my stylist. Great skills and patience in cutting a bob for me. Picked out references for the cut I wanted, and was always gracious in taking time to touch up when I requested. Price is competitive and result is tip worthy, will come back again.

Prices might be on a higher side, however you have got experienced and trusted hairstylists for your haircut, hair dye or perm! Clean salon, and would recommend to give it a shot if you stay or work around the area.

Was charged $18 for a very decent male haircut. I am very picky about basics: symmetrical sides, even shaving, appropriate length, clean finishing. Hairstylist was patient and willing to help make small adjustments to my liking. Perfect solution to avoid spending
